text: Great! That sounds ideal. Jeez, sorry for taking so long in replying! We are in crunch at the moment for a TV show we are delivering. Three episodes of VFX to deliver by next Friday! This time of the project the hours tend to get pretty long. I've been doing 10-12 hour days pretty consistently for the last few weeks, and working Saturdays too. It's not always like this (and I'm sure it varies between companies), but it does happen at the end of most projects.
